name: Pocket7Games: Play for Cash
description:
Play Small Games to win BIG Cash!

Pocket7Games is the ALL-IN-ONE app for playing classic games like Solitaire, Black Jack, and Bubble Shooter in modern ways such as large tournaments and head-to-head competitions with CASH prizes. In Pocket7Games, you can actually win cash and other rewards by playing against real players! It’s just that easy!

Pocket7Games is a skill-based app where you can compete against players around the world and win real money. From casual classics such as Black Jack, Solitaire, and Bubble Shooter to newer arcade games like Block Puzzle and 2048 - Pocket7Games offers casual, but super fun games to compete against other real players!

Our games guarantee:
* A fair-competition gaming environment with real players
* All games are legitimate and clean;
* No hidden rules
* Ads free

We look forward to seeing you and your friends engage in some great matches here!
